frontmatter.title: CNCF Adopts Meshery to Advance Service Mesh Management
frontmatter.author: Mike Vizard
frontmatter.description: CNCF's adoption of Meshery, a service mesh management platform as a sandbox-level project. Discover how Meshery simplifies service mesh management, and explore Service Mesh Performance (SMP), a toolset for measuring service mesh efficiency, donated by Layer5 to CNCF.
